name: Low Grade Leather
description: Harvested from animal hides, it serves as a resilient material, essential for crafting durable armor and weapons in the wasteland.

name: Rusty Gears
description: Salvaged from low-level creatures, these basic machine parts are crucial for crafting and repairing machinery in the post-apocalyptic world of Dawnlight.

name: Machinery Grease
description: Heavy oil which maintains and enhance the performance of intricate machines, ensuring they operate smoothly in the harsh conditions of the wasteland

name: Smogling Core
description: Core orb obtained from Smoglings. This orb pulsates with potent energy and mana, offering a formidable resource for crafting powerful weapons.
